messages.message:
Hey! Not sure if other people ran into this issue when trying to build our javascript bundles, but if you recently installed node on your mac, the version isn't compatible with our version of node-sass.

support for the latest version of node (12.1.0) was added in node-sass 4.12: https://github.com/sass/node-sass/issues/2632

I fixed this by downgrading my node to 10 via instructions https://apple.stackexchange.com/questions/171530/how-do-i-downgrade-node-or-install-a-specific-previous-version-using-homebrew
I’d especially recommend using `nvm` to change node versions in case we ever upgrade in the future, it makes it really easy to change versions - `homebrew install nvm`
Hmm I'd love to help but I'm node useless. Maybe @Jessica or @Kerry could assist if Ted is occupied?
Looks like the PR is unrelated to this, it’s a refiner function thing
